1.entity_description: Ecological process in which organisms help transfer pollen, aiding plant reproduction.
1.resolution_context: Despite their small size, caterpillars are essential to the ecosystem as they play a crucial role in pollination and maintaining the balance of plant populations. This highlights their contribution to plant reproductive processes.
